title: 🧠 TaskHive - Freelance Task Marketplace
description: TaskHive is a modern freelance task marketplace where clients can post tasks and freelancers can complete them efficiently. It provides a simple yet powerful user experience with Firebase authentication and real-time UI updates.
features: 🔐 Secure login/signup with Google & email/password via Firebase
🎯 Role-based navigation depending on user type
📋 Task posting and browsing between clients and freelancers
📦 React Context API for global auth/user state management
challenges: Managing global auth state with React Context
Dynamic navbar rendering for authenticated vs unauthenticated users
Protecting dashboard routes based on user role
future: Add chat system between clients and freelancers
Add task status tracking and completion feedback

title: 👨‍💻 Career Code
description: Career Code is an interactive job-hunting web app that allows users to browse jobs, view job details, and apply with Firebase auth. It includes job categories, application management, and real-time data rendering.
features: 💼 Browse available jobs by category or company
📄 Detailed job pages with role, salary, and location
📝 Apply to jobs and manage application state
challenges: UI/UX consistency across mobile and desktop

title: 🐉 Dragon News
description: Dragon News is a modern news portal web application where users can browse categorized news articles, log in securely using Firebase Authentication, and enjoy a smooth and dynamic user experience. The app features client-side routing, date-wise news updates, a breaking news ticker, and a clean, responsive UI that works seamlessly on mobile and desktop devices. It also supports dark mode for better accessibility.
features: 📱 Fully responsive layout using Tailwind CSS and DaisyUI
challenges: Managing and persisting Firebase auth state
future: User profiles and saved article bookmarks
Better SEO via Next.js or static generation techniques
